attributes.action: Force National Grid to Underground their proposed new cables between Bramford (Suffolk) and Twinstead (Essex) to protect the Suffolk landscape from further blight.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
National Grid are proposing to blight the Suffolk Countryside with pylons to take a new set of power lines from their Bramford Substation. They are using a 50 year old technology and ignoring the viable option of undergrounding these new cables. Undergrounding does have a higher cost (although not as high as National Grid would like you to believe), but what price do you put on a beautiful landscape. If you support undergrounding of these power lines please sign this petition.

Thanks you.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to force National Grid to Underground their proposed new cables between Bramford (Suffolk) and Twinstead (Essex) to protect the Suffolk landscape from further blight.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=undergrounding


Her Majesty's Government
